import React from "react"; import Card from "../components/card" import FormGroup from "../components/form-group"; import { withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' class CadastroUsuario extends React.Component { state = { nome: '', email: '', senha: '', senhaRepeticao: '' } constructor(){ super(); this.service = new UsuarioService(); } cadastrar = () => { console.log(this.state) } cancelar = () => { this.props.history.push('/login') } render(){ return(
this.setState({nome: e.target.value})} /> this.setState({email: e.target.value})} /> this.setState({senha: e.target.value})} /> this.setState({senhaRepeticao: e.target.value})} />
) } } export default withRouter( CadastroUsuario );
